string.name: Subhead
string.b: Open AMP web page without AMP

resources.string: When viewing an AMP webpage (e.g., in Chrome), use Share action and select this app to open that webpage without AMP (using the default browser, not necessarily the same browser).

This works best on a page that Google has converted to AMP on the fly from a non-AMP host (e.g., mobile.nytimes.com). Hosted AMP pages (e.g., amp.usatoday.com) cannot be directly converted to equivalent non-AMP pages.

Support: If you encounter a case where this app does not work properly, instead of giving it a low rating, use Help to open an Issue and give us details (URL, browser, Android version, device) and we will do our best to fix it.
Privacy: This app does not collect, store, or share any personal or browsing data, except for opening a no AMP page when you request it.
Disclaimers: Use at your own risk.\nNot affiliated with or endorsed by Google.
